title: Anarchy
description: The Charismatic New York Mob Boss Alfonzo Has Returned with a Vengeance!A designer drug has exploded on the Miami club scene, but it's quickly spread to the east and west coasts to become a new drug of choice among rich college kids and suburbanites. The potent drug is called, 'Anarchy', and also goes by the street names, Suburban Candy or Blue Fire, because of its sweet taste and euphoric high. However, the illegal drug wreaks havoc on the organs of its unsuspecting users and one major side effect is death.The mob insurgent manufacturing the deadly substance is getting rich and gaining allies as he plots to promote himself to the ultimate status of Capo Crimini of La Costra Nostra. First, he must eliminate the only men standing in his way, the untouchable Mob Boss Alfonzo Diaz and his powerful Italian cousin Don Dichenzo. Friends die, loyalties are tested and old rivals emerge looking to exact payback for Alfonzo's past transgressions -but it's the betrayal by two people Alfonzo trusts most he will never see coming!An fast-paced drama, with sensual and explosive action sure to awaken the senses in this third installment of ALFONZO!
author: S.W. Frank
